actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the appointment of the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to be subject to Senate confirmation.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require that the appointment of the Commissioner of Food and Drugs of the Food and Drug Administration be subject to Senate confirmation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the appointment of the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to be subject to Senate confirmation.
